Name: Arnold Palmer
Ingredients: 30 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir.
Review: A real lemon iced tea. Balanced and refreshing.
History: A popular drink throughout the United States. Named after and said to be a favourite of the legendary golfer.
Nutrition: One serving of Arnold Palmer contains 106 calories
